listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.1-0 are included:

listitem.simpara: The package univention-sudo has been added. It provides default rules for sudo. If installed and the &ucsUCRV; auth/sudo is turned on, users in the group Domain Admins are allowed to run arbitrary commands with root privileges (37995).
The UUID generation has been moved to the setup process (40640).
A pop up which asks for a page reload is no longer shown at the end of an installation (39974, 39156).
Small text and translation adjustments have been done (40140, 40053).
The join scripts are now executed in a working chroot environment to allow the installation of a DC Master using the profile based installation (40559).
The repository path and versions in the template file for profile based installations were updated for UCS-4.1 (39937).
The name of the menu entry for booting from the local hard disk was changed to local to prevent a name collision (38821).
The package description has been extended to simplify finding the package when searching for Preboot Execution Environment (PXE) (33361).
The daemon used to wait for successful installations has been changed to listen on all network interfaces by default (34061).
The Linux kernel has been updated to 4.1.16. It provides many bugfixes and fixes several vulnerabilities (40481, 40059, 40558).
Two new Univention Configuration Registry variables grub/default and grub/savedefault have been added. These variables allow the selection of the next kernel to boot (26763).
The UEFI boot hangs on some hardware in the boot loader. This issue has been fixed (#39009).

When a domain controller (DC) master or DC backup is created, two policies are now created or modified: a LDAP server policy to be used by member servers and a UCR policy be used by DC slaves. The policies configure them to use the LDAP servers of all available DC backups, in case the DC master is down. The LDAP server policy is activated on members, the UCR policy for slaves is not activated by default (38091).
The attribute printerModel has been added to LDAP sub-string search index (39884).
The script /usr/share/univention-ldap/ldap_setup_index has been extracted. It can be used to manage the attributes, which are indexed by the LDAP server (39866).
Some shell quoting errors have been fixed (40031).
Only initialize the LDAP server on the DC Master and abort on errors (38051).
The attribute univentionMessageCatalog has been added to the LDAP schema for the univentionUDMHook and univentionUDMSyntax object classes (35840).
The listener cache flushing has been disabled during module initialization (39957).
Some replicated objects were not deleted when the LDAP server closed its side of the LDAP connection. This issue has been fixed (40067).
The Samba 4 Connector is now stopped during re-joins (40391).
Translation format strings with multiple unnamed arguments have been adjusted (40339)

If the connection to the LDAP server is closed, it is now automatically re-connected. This fixes joining in large environments, when the LDAP server is restarted while a new system is joined. The number of re-tries can be configured through the new &ucsUCRV; listener/ldap/retries (40460).

The Univention Configuration Registry variables dns/nameserver/registration/forward_zone and dns/nameserver/registration/reverse_zone have been added. These variables allow to disable the automatic registration as additional nameserver (40139).
Some shell quoting errors have been fixed (40031).
The username field in the login dialog doesn't get cleared anymore (39898).
The help text field in the login dialog shows a hint about the root user when username=root is given as a query parameter (40144).
The alignment of the single sign on button has been adjusted (40146).
Display problems in the grid header when using Internet Explorer have been fixed (39498).

A crash is prevented if a notifier timer removes a socket while there are pending IO events from this socket. Univention Management Console was affected by this bug and it resulted in faulty behavior of UMC modules (40510).
Missing translation files won't cause a HTTP 404 Not Found error anymore (40242).
Translation format strings with multiple unnamed arguments have been adjusted (40339).
Internet Explorer 11 doesn't show a download pop up anymore when accessing UMC (39861).
The versions of outdated browsers have been updated (40402).
Some minor usability adjustments for the login dialog have been implemented (40402).
The dh_umc debhelper doesn't create duplicated message entries or false warnings about fuzzy PO file headers anymore (40341).
Translation format strings with multiple unnamed arguments have been adjusted (40339).
The file permissions of files installed by the dh_umc debhelper have been adjusted (30520).
The categories of UMC modules can now be configured more easily. It is also possible to add links to the UMC module overview (40528).
On touch devices the description of an app is now visible by touching the app once. Touching a second time will open the detail page (39663).
Installed apps are now correctly stored in repository/app_center/installed even when bypassing the App Center (40087).

The check whether docker is up and running at the startup of the App Center can now be disabled by setting the &ucsUCRV; appcenter/docker to =disabled. In this case, Docker Apps cannot be installed anymore (40074).
The command univention-app shell has been added. It runs a command within the environment of a Docker App (40119).
Warnings shown before App installations do not show up as errors after a successful installation anymore (39926).
Failed Docker App installations now correctly remove their Docker containers when cleaning up (40135).
Downloading specific files from the App Center server now makes use of ETags, resulting in a speedup of module opening (40136).
The layout of the App Center gallery has been improved (39662).
On an app details page, it is now possible to navigate to the previous and next app in the search results (39664).
The app details page for small domains has been simplified (40116).
Apps now support RequiredAppsInDomain which can be used to state that a specific App has to be installed somewhere in the domain in order for the current App to work (37539).
Various performance optimizations have been done in the App Center code (40239, 40240).
The developer scripts for using a local App Center have been fixed (40359).
One function of the Docker Apps join script helpers has been fixed when called from within the UMC module (40264).
Uninstalling the last app doesn't cause a Forbidden pop up anymore (39157).
Calling univention-app does not log the complete set of options, instead just the name of the action being called (40287).
The command univention-app upgrade now correctly upgrades all packages for non Docker Apps (40060).
The attribute univentionAppID has been added to the LDAP equality search index (39866).
Translation format strings with multiple unnamed arguments have been adjusted (40339).
The function joinscript_run_in_container from the Docker Apps join script helper functions now correctly passes its arguments to univention-app shell (40523]).
The support for plain Docker images has been enhanced (bug: [40604).
The attribute Screenshot has been replaced by Thumbnails (40160).
Support for upgrading conventional Apps to Docker Apps has been added (40561).
The error handling has been improved. This results in useful error messages especially when a connection to the LDAP service failed (40069).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: The locale is not replaced by the Country syntax class anymore. This caused side effects in all processes which imported the UDM python modules. For example the translation of the App Center UMC modules was not possible (39146).

From now on domain names for mail domains will be lowercased when created or modified. Existing domain names will not be changed automatically, only when they are modified. Mixed case domain names caused inconsistent behavior with Dovecot and shared folders (39721).
The syntax check for the Base64GzipText attribute type had an error that made it impossible to store data in such an attribute. This issue has been fixed (40348).
The simple syntax class now allows None values to be able to e.g. remove the birthday of a user (32321).
Some shell quoting errors have been fixed (40031).
Translation format strings with multiple unnamed arguments have been adjusted (40339).
It is now possible to ship translations for UDM hooks and UDM syntax settings (34556).
The modification list is now generated independent of the ordering of attribute values. This prevents errors when modifying objects in case the permissions of the executor aren't sufficient (40120).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: The package univention-system-activation has been rebuild with all intended changes for UCS 4.1. This fixes a bug with system setup not being able to finish correctly (40019).
The term Univention App has been replaced by Appliance (40304).
More input validation for certificate values has been added (39376).
The country name field in the ldap DN is now validated (39941).
The email address field provides a virtual keyboard for special characters (38567).
Some shell quoting errors have been fixed (40031).
The term Univention App has been replaced by Appliance (40304).
Translation format strings with multiple unnamed arguments have been adjusted (40339).
Fixed typos in German translation have been fixed (39886, 40344).
The free disc space requirement in the updater's preup script has been increased to 1.5GiB (39991).

The AWS EC2 image Univention Corporate Server (UCS) 4.1 (official image) rev. 0 uses the repository server updates-test.software-univention.de instead of updates.software-univention.de. This update resets the &ucsUCRV; repository/online/server on EC2 images to updates.software-univention.de (40142).
The layout in the UMC software update module has been adjusted to be responsive (36444).
UCS-3.0 errata updates are no longer mirrored with newer systems (29633).
The inheritance of using https for components has been fixed (40148).
If no update process is currently running, the UMC module won't block closing UMC anymore (39780).
The update process via the UMC module can be started if the logfiles don't exist (40051).
The HTTP timeout has been reduced to 30 seconds (39954).
Some shell quoting errors have been fixed (40031).
A vulnerability has been fixed which could lead to code execution (39993).
A progress bar is now shown while rebooting the system (40343).
The update scripts have been adjusted to UCS 4.1-1 (40624).
The package database was not updated automatically on systems other than the database server. This issue has been fixed (33935).
Some shell quoting errors have been fixed (40031).
Atjob comments are now properly encoded (39993).
It is now possible to ship translations for UDM hooks and UDM syntax settings (34556).
The SAML logout process is now more robust (39815).
It is now possible to import a license file when being logged in via single sign on (39675).
The sender address of token emails is now changeable with the &ucsUCRV; umc/self-service/passwordreset/email/sender_address (40048).
It is now possible to use the password reset service with the primary email address instead of the username (40049).
The server name used in token emails is now configurable via the &ucsUCRV; umc/self-service/passwordreset/email/webserver_address (40107).
Tokens aren't written to log files regardless of the configured debug level (39996).
The unjoin scripts are executed when removing the package (39980).
The links on the ucs-overview are removed when uninstalling (40033).
Redirections are now restricted to relative paths only (39981).
It's not possible to gain information about existence of users anymore (39939).
The postrm script has been modified to correctly restart apache2 (40061).
When a password policy checking password quality was activated, the password reset module would crash on a bad password. This issue has been fixed (40433).
The error handling during connecting to the UMC server has been improved (40581).
If the self-service app was installed during the initial system configuration, the service could not connect to the UMC server (40582).
An error in the Dovecot listener could lead to the unintended deletion of a shared folder if the corresponding LDAP objects is changed. This issue has been fixed (40014).

The UMC permissions write and all for shared folders did not contain the IMAP permission for expunge. A removal of mails or moving mails was not possible. This problem has been fixed and the permission will be updated automatically if the join script of univention-mail-dovecot is called (40038).
A premature scheduling of the DH parameter generation caused an atd process to hang in Docker containers. This issue has been fixed (40134).
A bug in the mailing list filter policy server allowed senders with an empty envelope email address to send to restricted mailing lists. This issue has been fixed (40353).

The timeout for the initial LDAP search during domain join was increased to two hours, as joining in a large domain can take much longer than the default five minutes. The time can be changed through the &ucsUCRV; listener/timeout/scans (40373).
A file for the process of handling user renames has been moved to a secure location (40245).

A problem regarding IMAP ACLs at shared folders with primary mail address has been fixed. ACLs that have been removed via Univention Management Console or CLI have not been removed on the IMAP server (40194).
A file for the process of handling user renames has been moved to a secure location (40246).
Errors when checking restrictions of mailing lists and mail groups are now written to the system mail log (40376).

The user that wants to send to a restricted mailing list or group mail is now determined using the SASL login. This requires, that the sender logs into the server to deliver the email. To enable the previous behavior (to use the email address declared by the sender), set the &ucsUCRV; mail/postfix/policy/listfilter/use_sasl_username to no (29615).
The policy server checking restrictions of mailing lists now exits without error, when told to by Postfix (40569).
The default CUPS policy has been fixed and is now configurable via the Univention Configuration Registry variables cups/policy/.* (38023).
The univention-printserver join script now restarts the cups daemon (40591).
Some shell quoting errors have been fixed (40031).
Certificate variables are now correctly escaped when writing to configuration file before creating new certificates (39376).
This update adds the possibility to define the number of squid's rewrite helper processes via the new &ucsUCRV; squid/rewrite/children (40095).
When basic auth is enabled, disabled user accounts cannot use the proxy anymore (39901).
Added new configuration option dbtemp to squidGuard that specifies a directory for temporary backing files of the in-memory databases (40592).
The init script now stops the apache process before restarting if a reload crashes the apache process (40061).
A warning about unencrypted HTTP connections has been added to the UCS overview page (39361).
The HTTP redirection has been changed to a permanent redirection when forcing HTTPS access (40121).
HTTPS is not enforced for the apache mod_status resources (40173).
Links on the UCS overview preserve the port if accessed through a non default port (40070).
A German word list has been added, so that passwords can be checked to not include German words (24840).
A dependency on the package univention-sudo has been added. The sudo rules are not automatically activated on updating systems, only on new installations (37995).
Create the user messagebus as the owner for /etc/libnss-ldap.conf. Thanks to Lutz Willek (38993).
VMs not specifying the disk driver type don't crash anymore (39825).
The migration of paused VMs is now allowed (39242).
The VNC button tool-tip has been fixed (33982).
The AWS API for EC2 region eu-central-1 (Frankfurt am Main) is now supported (36141).
Support for Virtual Private Clouds (VPC) with AWS EC2 has been added (36289).
The deprecated support for TLS/SSL connections and authentication through PAM has been removed (40180).
The deprecated code for booting old VMs through PXE has been removed (40181).
The command line tool for debugging UVMM has been improved (40182).

Some unused helper code has been removed to fix an import error of the Python libvirt module from the UVMM Univention Directory Listener module handling the dynamic addition and removal of virtualization hosts (40133).
The cron job to check libvirtd is no longer required and has been removed (35101).
The Docker engine now uses a HTTP proxy for downloading of images, if the &ucsUCRV; proxy/http is configured (40030).
Samba has been updated to 4.3.3. This includes an update of the packages talloc, tdb, tevent, ldb, univention-ldb-modules (40221).
In certain situations samba restart left samba in a non-functional state (40132).
When closing sessions the smbd server processes exited with a memory corruption error (40131).
The &ucsUCRV; samba/register/exclude/interfaces has been added to configure samba to ignore certain network interfaces. The interface docker0 is ignored by default (39601).
The sysvol-sync script now checks if any changes need to be synchronized at all and it uses file locking to coordinate concurrent read and write processes (40186).
The ACL check in the sysvol-sync script is now limited to the Policies directory (40266).

There are two new Univention Configuration Registry variables samba4/sysvol/sync/from_upstream and samba4/sysvol/sync/from_downstream which can be used to deactivate copying files from other DCs (40313).
This update fixes an issue where libunivention-ldb-modules would refuse to load due to an updated ldb library (40437).
Translation format strings with multiple unnamed arguments have been adjusted (40339).
On UCS@school Samba AD DC Slaves the univention-samba4 joinscript could take a long time to wait in vain for an object to get synchronized to the DC Master (33399).
Some shell quoting errors have been fixed (40031).
Re-join during UCS@school Samba AD DC Slave setup could fail due to krb5.keytab containing differing Kerberos key hashes for the same key version number. This issue has been fixed (40434).
The new package univention-nagios-s4-connector provides a Nagios plugin to check the state of the univention-s4-connector (37006).
The synchronization failed if a removed user was recreated at a different position. This issue has been fixed (40233).

msPrint-ConnectionPolicy objects are now synced if the &ucsUCRV; connector/s4/mapping/msprintconnectionpolicy is set to true. The S4 connector has to be restarted after changing this Univention Configuration variable. This is required for UCS@school and will be set there accordingly (40298).
Wildcard DNS records didn't get synchronized any more. This issue has been fixed (40380).

UCS 4.1-0 Erratum 39 accidentally set connector/s4/listener/disabled to true on UCS Samba/AD DCs which run an S4 Connector in an UCS domain where multiple S4 Connector services are registered in LDAP. This may affect a DC Master in an UCS@school environment. This doesn't affect UCS Samba/AD DCs where the &ucsUCRV; connector/s4/allow/secondary is set to true, which comprises UCS@school Samba AD DC Slave systems (40467).
The C library can deadlock in a call to getaddrinfo(), when the Linux kernel returns an empty answer for the used NETLINK call (40059).
The package pylibmc has been added to the maintained package repository of UCS (40209).
This update fixes a crash of the UCS policy conformance checker ucslint for the case, when issues don't include a file name or reference a not existing file (36456).
This update adds an updated SSL implementation for Python, which is required to support the new AWS API for EC2 region eu-central-1 (Frankfurt am Main) (36141).
The program wget loads the SSL certificates multiple times, which makes is slow and consumes a lot of memory, which can lead to it being killed by the Linux kernel. This issue has been fixed (39940).
The backend of univention-welcome-screen has been changed from Firefox to Plymouth (39241).
The package xml-security-c was re-built to satisfy the dependency of open-vm-tools (40244).
The robustness of the univention-ucs-translation-build-package.py has been enhanced (40340).
No fuzzy PO file header entries are created anymore in univention-ucs-translation-template (40341).
The package sysstat has been added to the maintained package repository of UCS (40203).
